review.title: “Several years and still happy!”
review.pros: Pros – Great people. Fun, challenging and collaborative environment. Management genuinely cares about the staff, and they offer flexible work schedules where you can work 9 hours Monday through Thursday and 4 hours on Friday! Some people even work from home on Friday's, depending on their job duties and commute.
review.cons: Cons – Kaiser health plan can be a CON for some. The management is a bit of a boy's club and is often not transparent enough. They're also reluctant to hire "unbillable" support - resulting in a shortage of administrative manpower.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Hire some paper pushers and share "the plan!"
